title: aDiyOraik-kaDaittETri
sahitya:
aDiyOraik-kaDaittETri viDavENum ayyA vaDapzahani kuDi koNDa vaDivazhagu vElavA


anupallavi

  paDi idanilE pASha paDukuzhiyil orupOdum taDumAri vizhundu kiDandu uzhalAmal


caraNam    maDamaiyODu piDivAda matihIna kaDaiyaroDum koDum sheyal puriya kUsiDAda nIcaroDum
toDarb-Edum koLLAda dhiDa cittamuDan vAzha kaDugaLavEnumE un kaDaikkaN aruL Indu
